ComicInfo.Title: Scrubba-Dub Death!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Howard is able to stave off Dr. Bong’s latest attack…while he’s taking a shower? But that’s not all! Can Howard save new friend Sudd from his monstrous transformation?
Howard takes a job as a dishwasher and gets trained by a man named Sudd. When Sudd accidentally leaves a can of cleaner in a microwave, the resulting explosion turns him into SUDD, the Scrubbing Bubble that Walks Like a Man!
Note: Fifi only appears in a flashback
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-14 21:14:16. [CVDB18188]
ComicInfo.Characters: Doctor Bong, Fifi, Howard the Duck, Lee Switzler, Sudd
